cetus.hir
Class ConditionalExpression

java.lang.Object
  cetus.hir.Expression
      cetus.hir.ConditionalExpression
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Traversable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Comparable<Expression>
public class ConditionalExpression
extends Expression

Represents the only ternary expression in C and C++, the ?: operator.

Constructor Detail

ConditionalExpression

public ConditionalExpression(Expression condition,
                             Expression true_expr,
                             Expression false_expr)
Constructs a conditional expression with the specified condition, true part, and false part.

Parameters:
condition - the condition expression.
true_expr - the expression being evaluated if condition is true.
false_expr - the expression being evaluated if condition is false.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if one of the parameters is invalid.
NotAnOrphanException - if one of the parameters has a parent object.

Prints a conditional expression to a stream.

Parameters:
e - The expression to print.
o - The writer on which to print the expression.
